attributes.additional_details: The government should do this to improve lives, Let people earn an income, Improve mental health, Reduce fear in people, Allow visitation to family and friends and remain relationships. The government have continued to change how long we are on lockdown suggesting they don’t know anything about the virus which is the most important reason for letting us get back to normal life.
attributes.background: We should lift lockdown but keep measures in place such as social distancing. This would allow people to try and get back to normal life.
